title: 政府家陣亂告人 並唔係想告得你入 係想消耗你既金錢同時間

replies.msg: 打官司都要錢要時間
有無咩應對方法 真係唔係人人有咁既錢去打官司

係
一向林鄭都係玩手段唔係真正解決問題
宜家政府係要解決提出問題既人
冇人提出問題就冇問題

We keep alert the tourists away form Hong Kong, just spend what is necessary, keep the assembly and march as much as possible every week to force the retail shop and shopping mall close more frequently.

If increasing the social cost, and frozen the economy as much as possible, the overseas investment will likely withdraw from HK, the government will have significant pressure from the commercial sector, financial sector, we may have to face with the economic depression, BUT we may have chance to take back the control..........
